name: One Night At Boxy's
description:
This is the first FNAF fangame i ever created. This game is in PRE-BUILD. So remember, contact me if there are bugs. THIS GAME IS DEMO. UPDATES COMING SOON.

THIS GAME IS FOR WINDOWS ONLY.  SORRY, macOS, LINUX, AND ANDROID USERS.

We will make more updates in the future. New camera rooms, and some other stuff.

Keep in mind that old versions work, but we will not update the old ONAB games.

This game is made with FNAF Engine. Credit to the person who made it.

GameJolt Version: One Night At Boxy's by zackson.(B0X0) - Game Jolt
